# Exact Hypervolume

* Original [implementation](https://lopez-ibanez.eu/hypervolume) of the dimension-sweep algorithm by Manuel López-Ibáñez as described in @fonseca2006.
* Original [implementation](http://web.tecnico.ulisboa.pt/luis.russo/QHV/) of the Quick Hypervolume algorithm (QHV) by @russo2014.
